website_summaries.verdict: A safe no-frills bet for basic protection, but other units afford more resistance to break-ins and forced entry.
pros: Draws buyers with its low price tag and very easy operation
cons: Lacks the durability of other models

customer_reviews.title: You have been warned.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this lock. Immediately after installation, I was able to lock the door with the key ... but not unlock it. That's a major problem since the lock is installed on a shed door, and there's no other way in. Don't believe that there is customer service available. There's not. You can't reach them by phone and can only fill out a form on their website -- but don't expect human contact. MiLocks' customer service is *amazingly* bad. Don't bother with this lousy lock, and lousy company.
customer_reviews.author: S. Manning

customer_reviews.title: This is the absolute worst keyless locking mechanism on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute worst keyless locking mechanism on the market. It did not come with any keys and it locks us out of the home at least weekly. If you do not push the correct code the very first attempt it disables itself and will not unlock. I emailed the company and, of course, they put the onus on me. Stating I should change the batteries more often and punch the correct code. I recommend you not purchase this product
customer_reviews.author: Issac

customer_reviews.title: Broke shortly after installation
customer_reviews.text: Broke shortly after installation. Just after the return window ended. The deadbolt still functions manually and with the key, but the keypad produces nothing but a loud angry whirring noise and does not lock or unlock the door. It's too fragile to be worth installing. Get a regular deadbolt and save yourself a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Good lock, watch the version if you're looking for a smartlock though.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon reviews & questions have unfortunately steered me wrong again. I purchased a DF-02SN in part because the information implied that it was Insteon compatible. It is not. The QF-02SN (and QF-01SN) are. Basically just a smarter version of this lock that is compatible with smartphones and whatnot. The lock works fine with the numeric keypad - I wanted more remote options though which the DF line does not do. I'm looking forward to the day when Amazon separates reviews to the product, not the whole product line.
customer_reviews.author: Stopokingme

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Worst product I've purchased. Took me 2 days to reach customer service because their voicemail was full. When i did reach them they told me the lock wasnt working because my AA batteries were too weak. Then i go buy brand new top of the line AA's from the store. Works for 1 day and stops working again. 4 more days of calling to a full answering machine that cant take messages. Didnt matter what time of day i called i got the voicemail. I own the digital door handle from these guys and it works great. Sad to say this product and the customer service from this company was horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased Defiant Electronic Deadbolt Square Keyless Entry prior to buying the Milocks DF-02OB
customer_reviews.text: The Defiant system is far and away the better lock. It is well constructed with a number of features that the Milocks did not have. The missing features which I really appreciate on the Defiant, are the Milocks does not have a self locking system as does the Defiant. The Defiant allows you to set the self locking from 30 seconds to 1 1/2 minutes. Also the Defiant has 10 separate user combinations where the Milock has but 6. I would not buy the Milocks Electronic Deadbolt again... And surprisingly the Defiant actually cost less... a Win-Win. Jerry Edwards
customer_reviews.author: Western Staffing Solutions, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Works great, well made and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Now to be fair, I have installed these before on other homes. But that being said. The instructions were perfect and easy to understand, both for installation and for programming the combination. A hint... don't fully tighten all the screws until you test the freedom of movement of the locking deadbolt and that it fits into the opening in your doorframe smoothly. Then tighten everything up. Item is VERY well made and good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: wxman58

customer_reviews.title: Great lock for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My better half asked me to get a electronic lock for our inside garage/foyer door. We rarely use the front door because it involves unlocking the screen door as well. The unit has a very nice subdued/satiny finIsh. The smaller numbers/lettering on the keyboard are harder to read, but muscle memory helps tremendously! The lighting is adequate for low-lighting. Installation was quite easy even with the builders’ botched lock placement. Replacing the batteries takes minimal effort. One has to be sure that the door is closed tight or the lock will correctly not force itself onto the door plate.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dub

customer_reviews.title: My wife likes it, so I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it was to install and program. It’s a simple coded deadbolt lock, not WiFi enabled. It makes coming and going so much easier. We can go for a walk or bike ride without carrying our keys or taking the house key off the ring and worrying about losing it. It’s also great for when my keys are in the car ignition and I have to run back inside for something. Or when we get home, and my wife really has to pee, and doesn’t have her keys, she can use the code to get inside. All first world problems but would definitely recommend 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I'm changing my rating to 1star because after having it for almost 2months, it doesn't want to open or close using the buttons and/ or codes. And the return window has closed, so now what? I want a refund or a new replacement. I also tried changing the batteries and still doesn't work properly. The key works fine. I bought this dead bolt because i have the regular door combinations and they work well on the bedroom doors.
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: Starting to Fail
customer_reviews.text: So I have not had this lock very long and it is already starting to fail. I have changed the batteries twice with no change. Walk up to the lock, enter your code and press unlock, it make a series of noises that sounds like it is unlocking and then relocks. At this point I am think I am going to have to look for a new solution for my front door.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Crap. Don't waste your money. Looks nice, but on day 2 it started a long, continuous beep that wouldn't stop until I removed the batteries. (And, yes, I tried fresh batteries as their site suggests is usually the problem when the unit doesn't work.) This randomly happened over the next 6 weeks, then it stopped opening of closing. Just spend the money on a Schlage and be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and useful
customer_reviews.text: I have had this just over a month now, and it seems to work perfectly. It did not fit on my door, as i have a window in my door, with the slats running across it. I used a dremel tool to route out the area of the molding that was in the way, and made it fit. So if you have a door with a window in it, that runs all the way across it, this will not fit without some modification to the door. Besides that, very convenient and useful product. I give it five stars for working correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Thor Allen

customer_reviews.title: Well it won't lock and there is no customer service
customer_reviews.text: I received a completely different lock that what was advertised, which is a shame because I ordered this one to match the previous one I ordered. The lock won't accept a code and won't lock, so now I have to put the old one back on and return this one plus the other "matching" one. Such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K.

customer_reviews.title: It's great. My only complaint is that the beeping while ...
customer_reviews.text: This makes our life so much easier..no more juggling 2 kids and a set of keys while I try and unlock the door. It's great. My only complaint is that the beeping while punching in the numbers and mechanical unlocking sound are pretty loud. Sometimes it wakes me up when my husband comes home and I'm already asleep.
customer_reviews.author: EmTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible lock! It wasted me 50 minutes to install and another 40 minutes to check each step again! Because the lock and unlock buttons don’t work!! Finally I figured it out! Those two buttons were in the wrong places. The “lock” button works as “unlock” and the “unlock” button works as “lock”! How ridiculous!! Plus, you have to enter the passcode to lock the door..... must return!!
customer_reviews.author: Emerald Liu

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my garage side door and after installing it it worked for 15 min then the locking mechanism kept getting stuck, I took it out and re-installed it this time ensuring every step for mechanical issues and no problems except after once again it was installed the locking mechanism failed and the lock would just make a clicking noise when attempting to close- Returned item - Poorly made - You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Vortex Cleaning Solutions

customer_reviews.title: I installed it no problem, but the lock failed ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed it no problem, but the lock failed to work. After several attempts to make the key pad lock open or lock the door? I couldn't make the program function at all. I called the milocks customer service rep, he talked me thru factory resets and in summary he said the electronic board is defective. He said he would send out a new one in the mail and I should use the return label enclosed to return the failed unit. Sounded reasonable however, I never got the replacement unit. Do yourself a favor don't bother with this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Bradley

customer_reviews.title: The lock sometimes doesn't read that it is locked so it won't unlock after you enter the code.
customer_reviews.text: The lock sometimes doesn't read that it is locked so it won't unlock after you enter the code. You have to lock and unlock it for it to fix. However if you are locked outside and don't have the key then you can't do this. So if you get this lock make sure you have the key somewhere neat by to get bypass the malfunctioning keypad.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T.

customer_reviews.title: after 6 months it will not open
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for 6 months and then 50% of the time it makes an uncommon beep after correct code and unlock it selected and does not unlock. I then have to go dig out my keys I then manually open and close the deadbolt and then try the keypad and it works... I have had my kids stranded outside my house numerous times because it works about half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Fenton

customer_reviews.title: It did not work out of the box initially but ...
customer_reviews.text: It did not work out of the box initially but I took it apart and wiggled the connectors. It eventually worked. Then 1 month later the motor stopped working. I took it apart again and got it to work. But what do you expect from a product half the cost of the competition. It's decent.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Piansay

customer_reviews.title: Cover was forced to be slightly off center.
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was the way I had attached the faceplate. Third time I put everything back together, I found that it was actually slightly off center, so there is a lean on the top toward the edge of the door. Worth it for the cost and I don't have to worry about my kids continuously losing / forgetting keys.
customer_reviews.author: SAMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these locks. The one never did work very well, the other just broke. ONLY 3 YEARS OLD!!!! For the price, I would have assumed they would last longer. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: D. Stull

customer_reviews.title: Lucky me
customer_reviews.text: I claimed a cheaper one from the warehouse due to "damage" ..it had a scuff mark on it.. barley noticeable!! Instructions were easy, installation was easy, programming my codes were easy.. love everything about it. So thank you to who ever returned it before due to a small scuff mark, i got a great $20 deal and love it, cant even see the scuff mark, its on the bottom... 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Look for a better lock.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Feb 2017 and by Dec 2017 the battery had died with no warning, locking me out of my house. I had left my keys in the house and turned back to get it and I couldn't get back into my house. I called the locksmith and the lock pick could not unlock this door. I didn't have time to wait for the locksmith so we had to destroy the lock. This lock didn't even last a full year. It is not worth the savings, get a better lock.
customer_reviews.author: Misty K.

customer_reviews.title: A great bargain
customer_reviews.text: the solenoid is a bit loud (you will definitely hear it locking / unlocking if you are in the same room). I would recommend using the included bolt assembly and strike plate (minimal assembly and no modification of my door cut outs was necessary. adding multiple codes was easy (max of 8 characters). I LOVE THIS LOCK! Only way it could be better is if I could sync it to an app but for the price it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dioclese

customer_reviews.title: Unable to install with the plate they ship with the lock
customer_reviews.text: Attempted to install. The plate that was shipped with the lock does not match the one in the picture. The one they shipped prevented the lock from being installed and had to return it. I will not be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Not even Close.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hate this product. It malfunctioned the next day after installation. Keypad randomly starts beeping for no reason half the time and other half it does not work at all. Am not slightly impressed at all. Price was cheaper, but I wish I hadn't bought at all. I threw away product packaging way too early or I'd have returned it. Just keep looking guys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a dependable product
customer_reviews.text: We have installed this lock according to the directions and have even talked to the MiLocks technician and we cannot get this lock to work. It will lock on demand, but will NOT unlock.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Pharo McDonald

customer_reviews.title: much better than a key!
customer_reviews.text: We love the fact that we don't have to go looking for a key to get into our condo. It works perfectly and there wasn't a problem installing. One thing to note is that if you use Lithium batteries, you will not have to replace AA batteries that often. My neighbor advised me of this as we liked his so much. Energizer makes a 4 pack of Lithium batteries. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MiLocks DF-02SN
customer_reviews.text: turn on the light use 4 batteries DOUBLE A a good product if, you enter the incorrect conestaña emits an alarm
customer_reviews.author: armando sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product, poor customer relations
customer_reviews.text: I had to choose 1 star because that is the lowest you can go and still explain your self. I installed electonic keyless entry the key pad only completely lit up one time it would beep would not lock or unlock. with the buttons or the key. attempted to contact customer service and you get an answering machine after at least 15 rings stating you needs to file a claim online. I attempted to return this product stating it was damaged and could not do so. I am out my money do not make the mistake I made and waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: A little loud, but other than that it’s a very good quality lock. I was replacing an existing deadbolt and it just slipped right into where the old one was installed, with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: RobJ

customer_reviews.title: Poor device, poor documentation, poor support, dont buy.
customer_reviews.text: the physical key did not fit the lock. The support was non existent. I called describing the issue, and leaving a call back number. Over a week later, no call back. Further, the 1st code I set would set the alarm off on its 1st time being used (you are meant to get three attempts) and the motor was very noisy. The documentation was poor. I returned the unit. This is one of the lowest priced electronic locks here. And there is a good reason. You get what you pay for. Dont waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Smartly CreatedTop Contributor: Scrapbooking

customer_reviews.title: Great lock for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great lock for the price. I ended up getting two from amazon warehouse. One was brand new the other was used. The finish is not as dark as most oil rubbed bronze nothing a little paint and fine sand paper couldn't fix. Its quite easy to modify a finish if you take the time.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: defective and poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a month ago. at first it worked for a bout a week, now it jams and gets stuck and we cant use it. I called the company several times and no one returns calls after 2 weeks. I don't want an equal replacement if this product is garbage. I want one that works. The company should return calls by the next day. I left 2 messages this week in which they were recorded...no one called me back
customer_reviews.author: mary  dacquisto

customer_reviews.title: Does not function
customer_reviews.text: Took this product out of the box and installed it in around 10 mins as it was replacing a lock of similar specifications and I didn’t need to do any drilling. Got it in and installed battery’s. Cleared all codes and set a new one. First time it worked, then it wouldn’t work so I reset it and started again. Worked one time out of 20. Then just stopped working completely. On to tech support who went through what I had already tried ten times. No help. Printed a return label. Do not buy this product. Looks like metal, is actually plastic. Cheaply made. Stay away
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Berigan

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SCAM
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product is defective and the manufacture ask you to call this people first to some number to try to win time to void amazon 30 day retuned warranty and after is expired not honere the company warranty and you loosing you money... the perfect scam be careful
customer_reviews.author: Yennier Capote

customer_reviews.title: Dead On Arrival
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set and installed it per spec and it was dead on arrival. I had used top of the line batteries and still nothing. I felt like I was sent someone else's rejected lock-set. I'm sending it back and I want a refund and I am going to not buy this set again. Don't waste your money, people.
customer_reviews.author: AuthorAda

customer_reviews.title: Zero customer support when you call for setting up the locks.
customer_reviews.text: Do not expect any custom support setting these up when you call they say fill out a warranty card and we will call you back, that was over a week ago. I will be returned all (4) I purchased if they don’t call by Thursday PM.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Klusmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Not Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to save a few dollars so I bought this over the Defiant I usually use. The installation was awful, the lock never locks, you have to hit unlock to lock it and lock to unlock, you can unlock it without a password - just a nightmare. Spend the extra money on something that works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this BECAUSE, when purchased the house the realtor had one on the door but took it when sold. So I got another, mine is a bit hard to lock from inside, its real tight, outside when setting to leave its real easy. not sure why
customer_reviews.author: DK2653

customer_reviews.title: U never lock yourself out again
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful. easy to install. very easy to operate. I like it so much getting one for the back door.
customer_reviews.author: eddie morgado

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Liked this product however I don’t like that it doesn’t have a door handle. Making the looking of the door difficult. It’s easy to use and cumbersome to install but overall it does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: but glad to see that it accommodated the thickness
customer_reviews.text: Twice this thing has sounded an alarm when I try to enter the code to get into our house and will NOT stop ringing. Wakes up the whole neighborhood. The only way to shut it off is to get a screw driver, remove the screw to the cover where the batteries are and then remove one of the batteries. It does work well otherwise, and our door is very thick (very old home with very thick doors). Was surprised, but glad to see that it accommodated the thickness. It is well made. My only beef is the alarm sounding twice.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Ballance - new Oct 2014

customer_reviews.title: Beats Keys for Rental
customer_reviews.text: Before this product, we had keys for our guests. We had to leave the bungalow open so they could check in at any time. Then we lost keys, or they took them with them when they checked out. Now, we email the door code. They love it and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Its not the best
customer_reviews.text: It gets stuck when trying to use key pad from time to time. You have to take it apart to reset the locking nipple. We just use the key for now. The lock and unlock buttons when using keypad are opposite. I had to figure that out. But i got this on overstock items so i guess I got what i paid for.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Customer service sucks
customer_reviews.text: Lock was great. Customer service sucks! I have been waiting over 6 months for someone to call me back because it quit working. They called once while I was working and left message. I called back and all I got was an automated message. Emailed them several times with no response.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleShane

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly how it should. I used duracell batteries. If the item doesn't lock properly, it is user error and you didn't install the metal plates between the door jams properly.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: Lock works nicely. Motor is a little weak our door is tight and as batteries get discharged the motor has trouble overcoming pressure against the deadbolt. This is solved by pulling lightly when disengaging the lock. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R J

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to use and install. No more fumbling for your keys
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gude

customer_reviews.title: Improve the packaging.  Otherwise, good enough
customer_reviews.text: Lock does it's job, only two issues with it. The minor issue is that sometimes it doesn't register the first button click, but as it beeps every time it registers a click, it's not a big deal. However, the packaging was crazy stupid. That really should be reduced just to ease the frustration of trying to open and install the lock.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Screws too short
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality seems nice - when I went to install it the screws that came with it were too short. I had to purchase longer screws in order to secure it to my door. Would have been nice to have longer screws or two sets - my door isn't anything fancy and seems to be a standard metal door.
customer_reviews.author: OHtoNC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to install into existing deadbolt door opening. Just be sure the door jam piece allows for the electronic lock to easily close without tugging on the door, otherwise it won’t lock.
customer_reviews.author: James O'Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after the third time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: Changed the batteries, worked twice and stopped again. I've ordered other locks like this that have continued working for YEARS without a battery change... this thing is worthless. AND unnecessarily difficult to install. Go with good trustworthy brand like the ones you see at the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Humboldthoney

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made foreign import
customer_reviews.text: 1st one arrived with broken off arm, this one had hard time setting up the code, but finally got it to work. I question the durability. Cheaply made , not american or german
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: I purchased two of these. Both are constantly malfunctioning ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. Both are constantly malfunctioning. It seems that the motor is just not strong enough to unlock the lock. It is completely defeating the purpose of keyless entry. I should've went with the more expensive reliable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dannie Gmail

customer_reviews.title: Piece of doodoo
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for the first 3 months and then the deadbolt wouldn't turn as it should. Took the whole thing apart and can't get the deadbolt mechanism to work properly. Deadbolt won't turn all the way as it should to lock all the way! Does leave me and my family any comfort when we go to bed at night.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Unreliable. Will work one day and then, inexplicably, not work the next. Customer service tells me to make sure the installation is "straight" and I have. If it were an installation issue, it would never work. Instead, it works for a day or two and then doesn't work. Will attempt to return it, either way it is junk and no use to me.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Sent Used Product
customer_reviews.text: Will return, poorly installed it does not work. Very disappointed and angry that my front door does not have a deadbolt it my family are left vulnerable. I want it replaced and reinstalled. I already made a phone call same day it was installed. I want it removed by Amazon and their subcontractor.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald  Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it!  Buy two or three!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one! I love them. The price is RIGHT; easy installation. Great finish. Allows up to 8 codes....Nuce if you have kids, friends, etc. Program the code to their birthday...easy to remember. A+A+A+A+A+A++A+A+A+
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stowell

customer_reviews.title: Just easy for an average person.
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to install and to program. And if I want to change the pass code it’s vert easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Marston

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Just opened to install and there are screws missing. Don’t buy this product. You should be able to return anything that’s not useable rather than giving you a deadline
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Nice look but if it's too WEAK to turn the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice look but if it's too WEAK to turn the thumb turn, it's worthless. Worthless.. This is the second MiLocks lock set I've purchased - both have motor/gear assembly that DOESN'T DO THE JOB of locking/unlocking the door with fresh AA (4) batteries.
customer_reviews.author: GaryAJUSA

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 7 months. Locked me out of my house.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and installed in March. 7 months later, it has stopped working and now I am locked out of my house. Spring for the more expensive, known brand. It's not worth the savings if you are locked out of your house.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Possibly faulty lock
customer_reviews.text: This worked well until it stopped working. A few times the deadbolt would not even respond to an entered code (correctly). It would make a sound like it was opening, and wouldnt. Finally, it just stopped turning. Re-installing and new batteries just didn't fix the issue. Have a replacement coming since it hasn't even been 20 days since purchase and install. Possible it was a faulty lock.
customer_reviews.author: Lety

customer_reviews.title: Nice bolt lock
customer_reviews.text: good product easy to install and set up codes. I did recently have an issue with the bolt shaft not retrieving all the way when electronically opened. I'm hoping I can get a response from the manufacture soon as I really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Palm Bay Powerhouse

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: The lock works very well . Easy to install in existing dead bolt holes. Easy to program. Great price! Note*not in instructions an alarm goes off if you input the wrong code 3 times!
customer_reviews.author: S.K.D.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 months, then died!!!
customer_reviews.text: This lock was easy to install and worked for about 2 months. Then it malfunctioned and would not unlock or lock. I thought it maybe the batteries so I replaced them and it still won't work. Really Disappointed in the quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Bedard

customer_reviews.title: Super satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Matches my oil rubbed bronze door handle perfectly. I saw a similar one at Lowe’s for $100+. It’s so easy to set the code too.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my 7 year old lock with this and it cost 1/3 what they did when I purchased the original. Does the same job for 1/3 the price, BARGAIN. Completely satisfied. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For $40 this is a great combination lock. I ended up buying two more for my other doors because they were so easy to install, about 20 minutes each and each door was different.
customer_reviews.author: Maven

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was very good. I called the number for an issue I ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a couple of weeks. Customer service was very good. I called the number for an issue I was having and had a very knowledgable person assist me. The issue was that I accidentally put old batteries in the lock. My only complaint is that the lock doesn't lock by itself after a minute like my kwikset one.
customer_reviews.author: Sundevil

customer_reviews.title: Faulty mechanism
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I ordered because the first worked so well with no glitches. The same installer couldn't get it to work properly, had to hit unlock to lock and lock to unlock. Last nite it wouldn't open with code OR key. Bolt wasn't moving far enough to open. Had to break in and even after dismantling the bolt is stuck in the door. Sadly it happened after my return window closed, but its definitely faulty
customer_reviews.author: Amzon

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good lock. We spend 10-15 minutes trying to get in at least once per week. It's good looking, bad working.
customer_reviews.author: Corporate Travel

customer_reviews.title: Change your batteries once a month.
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice dead bolt. Its convenient and programmable. Now I don't need to carry an extra key around with me and I don't have to give guests a spare key. However, you'll have to change the batteries out about once a month, or else you might find yourself locked out. That's a bit of a hassle. If the battery life were to be able to last longer, then this would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nang L

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and setup. Lasted two weeks and died. returned and am trying a "Kwikset" lock but still unable to get it programed.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We love these doorknobs! They work so well! We never have to worry if our teenage son remembered his house key again!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: U get what u pay , sometimes it does not want to open 😢
customer_reviews.author: veron

customer_reviews.title: Product was defective
customer_reviews.text: This lock worked perfectly for half an hour, then I tried to change the combination, and the lock failed to function forever after. Had to take it out and put the old one back. My advice is to test it thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: T. A.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how well these Worked. I paid nearly 3 times as much for previous ones, which were only slightly better.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Ross

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this last week. the lock they sent me did look slightly different with different buttons, but was spectacular for the money. Easy install easy set up and this one came with a Bluetooth feature allowing you to lock or unlock for my phone anywhere in the house. Best 40 bucks I’ve spent in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES

customer_reviews.title: it does not have automatic lock functino
customer_reviews.text: Overall is a good device but for me one of the main functions was the automatic lock and it does not have it, so I had to return the item. The service was good and I was fully refunded for it. if you dont need that function, this device is a good option. It is good that programming is done though the inside unit.
customer_reviews.author: salomon rima

customer_reviews.title: Bad shipping box and used looks
customer_reviews.text: Box was open and boxes ! It dosen't work !
customer_reviews.author: The Fonz

customer_reviews.title: Horrible lock. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible product. It worked well for a few weeks then it started having issues. It would only unlock sometimes. Other times the lock would only open a little but not all the way. I finally received a replacement but it was even worse! It was defective too. It would not unlock from the first time I installed it. Don't waste your money. Spend a little more and get something better.
customer_reviews.author: Kiyana

customer_reviews.title: Some numbers do not work!
customer_reviews.text: We put in the lock and for some reason the middle numbers will not take/register for codes? Took it off to check wiring, but found nothing? So, I can only use the outside digits for codes and not the middle column, 2,5, 8 & 0. Otherwise, outside numbers work fine and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I like the functionality, no key love that! Had it in since oct worked great , now It’s January, just 3 months & it takes 3 or 4 try’s to open my door w code! Not a good product! I know it it past my return time, but I believe I should be able to return or at least get a new one!! Plz email me a response! Blondiegirl317@ yahoo.com
customer_reviews.author: Joy Brolin

customer_reviews.title: Beats a key!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock. The existing 52 year old hole had to be made bigger but it was doable.
customer_reviews.author: Simeon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great looks. I bought a second.
customer_reviews.text: Love this lock so much I bought another one for the front door. Great quality and a great look.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: Great lock. Have had this for about 6 months without a problem. It is easy to install and works in combination with the Schlage combination door handle I have. The Schlage version of this unit was too big to work with their door handle unit as they were too close together to fit so I ordered this and it fit and works great. Installation was easy and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Grenier

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Worst product I've ever purchased. Difficult to understand instructions. Parts break apart. Product does not work. Trash
customer_reviews.author: Judy Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great until it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: This lock was easy to install and was fine for about a week until it stopped working. We created a keyless entry and it worked fine until some of the keypad numbers stopped working. We ended up sending it back for the defect. We did enjoy it while it lasted!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Just pay more and get a better quality lock
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but for some reason when installed the middle row of numbers don’t work. So I took it off the door and the middle row worked so I come to the conclusion that the pressure from being screwed to the door is causing a short or something
customer_reviews.author: Purplelady

customer_reviews.title: On flaw in the design but overall good.
customer_reviews.text: great value. works well but has one serious flaw. the flaw is that it can activated to the lock position (on the key side) but simply pressing the button without having to enter the code. If you have kids, they WILL lock you out so make sure you do not lose the code or the key.
customer_reviews.author: Creeker69

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't always unlock.
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't always unlock with the code. That is a serious problem as that completely defeats the purpose of a lock with a code. It's already installed....so not sure how to remedy this. Otherwise it looks nice and it was not too complicated to install.
customer_reviews.author: emily_minnesota

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok... works as it should
customer_reviews.text: The lock doesn’t light up when you press the buttons but otherwise works as expected. Nothing special, it works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L

customer_reviews.title: Failed 2 weeks after product support timeline :(
customer_reviews.text: MilLocks, overall I liked your product but it stopped working just after the warranty timeline. The bolt sticks halfway through the cycle or will not move at all. Batteries were replaced and I cannot determine any other troubleshooting. Can you provide any options?
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Lock cannot be installed with the hardware provided.
customer_reviews.text: Rated 1 star because I couldn’t rate 0. This lock came without a part required for installation. The factory told me I was on my own. Source the needed part elsewhere myself. Thanks to Amazon I returned this and a matching latch set for refunds.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Works, easy, affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to a key only lock it is so much easier. I bought this and it works very well. No more fumbling with keys or turning the car off to use the keys to reenter the house to retrieve something. Works. Easy. Affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This worked great, at first, after having it installed for a year it stopped working and will not actually lock the door.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee86

product_meta.title: MiLocks DF-02SN Electronic Keyless Entry Touchpad Deadbolt Door Lock
product_meta.description:
Color Name:Satin NickelThis keyless touchpad entry deadbolt allows you to unlock your door using a unique passcode. You can add up to 6 users and delete individual users if needed. Besides having your own personal passcode, it's also great for temporary house guest and service personnel. No more need for extra keys, experience the advantages of a keyless entry lock for your home at a very affordable price. The backlit touchpad easily lights up with the push of a button and facilitates operation in the night time. This deadbolt is a direct replacement for your traditional deadbolt and installs just as easy on both left handed doors and right handed doors 1 1/4"- 1 7/8" thick. (up to 2. 25" with extension kit available from manufacturer) It includes an adjustable latch with 2 different backset settings of 2 3/8" and 2 3/4" and features audible tones when locking, unlocking, and low battery warning. Operates on 4 "AA" batteries which are not included. This lock carries a 25 year mechanical , 1 year electrical , and a limited lifetime on the finish.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This keyless touchpad entry deadbolt allows you to unlock your door using a unique passcode. You can add up to 6 users and delete individual users if needed. Besides having your own personal passcode, it's also great for temporary house guest and service personnel. No more need for extra keys, experience the advantages of a keyless entry lock for your home at a very affordable price. The backlit touchpad easily lights up with the push of a button and facilitates operation in the night time. This deadbolt is a direct replacement for your traditional deadbolt and installs just as easy on both left handed doors and right handed doors 1 1/4"- 1 7/8" thick. (up to 2.25" with extension kit available from manufacturer) It includes an adjustable latch with 2 different backset settings of 2 3/8" and 2 3/4" and features audible tones when locking, unlocking, and low battery warning. Operates on 4 "AA" batteries which are not included. This lock carries a 25 year mechanical warranty, 1 year electrical warranty, and a limited lifetime warranty on the finish.
feature_bullets: Keyless deadbolt door lock with electronic touchpad keypad entry
Add up to 6 user passcodes and delete users individually
25 year Mechanical - 1 year Electrical - L lifetime Finish
